scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:KnowledgeManagementCollectionList}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
$core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('inSidebar.vm')
$core_v2_ui.PagedContent('list.vm')
$core_v2_ui.Pager($collections.PageIndex, $collections.PageSize, $collections.TotalCount, "%{ShowIndividualPages = 'false', ShowPrevious = 'true', ShowNext = 'true', PagedContentFile = 'list.vm', ShowFirst = 'true', ShowLast = 'true' }")
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" labelResourceName="CF_Title" defaultValue="${resource:KnowledgeManagementCollectionList}" dataType="String" template="core_v2_tokenizedString" /> <property id="showPostsColumn" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowPosts" defaultValue="true" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="showLastPostColumn" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowLatest" defaultValue="true" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="group" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_Group" defaultValue="Group=-1" dataType="Custom" template="core_v2_groupLookup" enableCurrent="true" /> <property id="itemsBeforeScroll" labelResourceName="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ItemsToShow" defaultValue="20" dataType="Int"> <propertyRule name="minmax" min="1" max="100" /> </property> </propertyGroup>
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="CF_Title">Widget Title</resource> <resource name="KnowledgeManagementCollectionList">Knowledge Management - Browse Knowledge Collections</resource> <resource name="KnowledgeManagementCollectionList_Description">Displays a list of knowledge collections.</resource> <resource name="LastUpdated">Latest: {0}</resource> <resource name="Options">Options</resource> <resource name="post_plural">documents</resource> <resource name="post_singular">document</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_Group">Group</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ItemsToShow">Number of results to display</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_NoResults">No results could be found.</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowLatest">Show Last Update</resource> <resource name="UIFragment_Core_BrowseApplication_ShowPosts">Show Post Count</resource> </language>
